intension: Create a Facebook advertisement for eco-friendly cleaning products, emphasizing their organic and healthy qualities. The brand name is Grinky.
globalcaption: The image features a wooden table with various cleaning supplies and tools arranged on it. There are several bottles of cleaning products, including a bottle of dish soap, a bottle of laundry detergent, and a bottle of all-purpose cleaner. A spray bottle is also present on the table.\n\nIn addition to the bottles, there are two brooms, one on the left side of the table and another on the right side. A pair of scissors can be seen on the right side of the table, and a towel is placed at the bottom left corner. The table is filled with these cleaning items,
keywords: clean, cleaner, household, cleaning, housework, housekeeping, bottle, cleanup, detergent, rags, washcloths, sponges, spray, eco, organic, facebook, ad, fb, advertisement, tb
